# wait-ci

CLI tool for waiting on CI pipeline completion.

## Installation

```bash
# Option 1: using `pipx`
pipx install wait-ci

# Option 2: using plain `pip`
python -m pip install --upgrade pip
python -m pip install wait-ci

# Option 3: using `uv`
uv pip install wait-ci
```

## Usage

```bash
wait-ci --help
```
